creditline: The Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation Endowment Fund
description: ceramic candle holder; male figure holding basket in PL hand, and remnant of an object in PR hand; exaggerated, pointed facial features; large brown eyebrows, moustache, and pointed goatee; wearing green top coat with incised patterns; figure becomes round from waist to base; lower half is beige; leaf design on head for candle
title: Candlestick in the Shape of a European Man
